title: Relais & Châteaux Manor House Stay near Toulouse with Fine-Dining French Restaurant
description:
Step inside Château de Drudas - an exquisite 18th-century manor house - where centuries of history are hidden within the storied walls and world-renowned Relais & Châteaux luxury awaits. This grand hotel, now listed as a Historical Monument, is perfectly located at the heart of the Occitanie region, between Toulouse and Montauban, in the charming village of Drudas. 

Prepare to be cosseted in contemporary comforts, with luxe amenities including an onsite spa and outdoor heated pool, and an elegant restaurant where guests are invited to sample intuitive cuisine that changes with the seasons. The menu has been designed by onsite chef Gabriele Ferri, who trained at the side of acclaimed French chef Pierre Gagnaire. Make the most of Drudas' verdant surroundings and delightfully calm atmosphere on a gentle hike, or visit the nearby towns to meander through cobbled lanes while stopping at boutique shops and restaurants.
offer_address: Château de, Le Village, 31480 Drudas, France
